text: Hans Rinner (18 March 1963 â€“ 16 February 2018) was an Austrian businessman and football administrator. From 7 December 2009 until his death, he was the President of the Austrian Football Bundesliga. Rinner was also the owner and manager of a refrigeration company. He was born in Semriach, Austria. From 2007 to 2010 he was president of SK Sturm Graz and then until 2016, member of the Supervisory Board. Since 2016 he was honorary president of the club. Rinner died on 16 February 2018 in Salzburg, Austria of pancreatic cancer at the age of 54. ==References== ==Other websites== * FRIGOPOL Category:1963 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Deaths from pancreatic cancer Category:Austrian businesspeople
title: Hans Rinner
